song.title: Warez Loader
song.info:
Lyrics: ----------- buried on my hard drive are isos and isos
they call me the warez maestro wherever i go
up you a torrent and ill serve it off my dedi
ill trade you some porn if your upstream is steady
my irc bots serve movies and games
and razor cracks cut deep straight through your veins
you slang dvd rips? just ask me
you got that new star wars? yea its nasty
i am the warez loder
your free hookup on whatever you need
right to your high speed
dcc me
leech me
hit me on my aim you know how to reach me
keep your ratios up or i ban you off my tracker
if you ain't sharing you're prolly a hacker
my switch lights up like a christmas tree
when i'm online surfing p2p
drop me a line when you see my handle
up in the names list in your channel
on second thought don't 'cuz its prolly a poser
the godfather ghost call me keyser soze
i am the warez loder
your free hookup on whatever you need
right to your high speed
dcc me
leech me
hit me on my aim you know how to reach me
i get all the good stuff before it hits the stores
i sweat zero day right out my pores
i get albums before they're finished rapping
terrabytes of porn so i'm always fapping
every episode of every show
screeners of movies from tokyo
why pay for things if you get them free
even i serve my album on IRC
i am the warez loder
your free hookup on whatever you need
right to your high speed
dcc me
leech me
hit me on my aim you know how to reach me
